DOC.brief_summary: The present project is aimed at describing the statins prescription pattern in Spanish patients. It will also look into how adequate these prescriptions are accordingly to the recommendations given in Treatment Guidelines and in the Summary Product Information.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study To Evaluate Statins Patterns Of Use In Spain
DOC.criteria: Patients receiving a new statin prescription (na√Øve patients) Patients having a change in their statin prescription (dose, switching, addition to another hypolipemic drug) Patients without enough information in the medical records to complete the fields required in the eCRF
DOC.keyword: New statins prescriptions in Spain (naive patients and switching)
